channel.title: How to fix model equip positions? plz help

item.title: How to fix model equip positions? plz help
item.dc:creator: @emtscape emtscape
item.description:
@emtscape wrote:

Go into Item.java file and look for helm, legs and stuff like that then add it in front of the 1st one… so like

//Few item types for equipping
public static int capes[] = {(bandos kite ID)14590,14591,15714,15713,14077, 14139, 11833,14073, 14079, 14076, 14094, 14082, 14085, 14088, 14127, 14133, 14109, 14124, 14130, 14106, 14121, 14118, 14100, 14097, 14103, 14112, 14136, 14091, 14074, 14080, 14095, 14083, 14086, 14089, 14128, 14134, 14110, 14125, 14131, 14107, 14122, 14119, 14101, 14098, 14104, 14113, 14137, 14092,

THEN COMPILE! and hopefully it works.

Read full topic

item.title: How to fix model equip positions? plz help
item.dc:creator: @swich9999999 swich9999999
item.description:
@swich9999999 wrote:

ok i have a bandoss kite shield model but when i play and try to equip it, its in the weapon slot… same thing for alot of the models. is there a way to fix this this is the code for the bandos kite } if(i == 13634) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 14041; //Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 1200; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 16; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 14042; //Male class8.anInt200 = 14042; //Female class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.aString170 = "Bandos Sheild"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Defence tool used by ancient bandos".getBytes(); }
